name: Agile Maneuvers
descriptionText: You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing combat maneuvers.
benefitText: You add your Dexterity bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus (see Chapter 8) instead of your Strength bonus.
normalText: You add your Strength bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus.
